title: Champion Shard
body: I have an Elise champion shard which needs 580 blue essence to upgrade her into perm. I have 867 blue essence and I can't upgrade her? I put my mouse over 'Upgrade to Champion Permanent -580' but it wont let me even tho I have 867 blue

replies.body: I took a look into this for you and I do see you have enough essences, but nothing out of the ordinary.  Give your client a relog in-case your connection might have lost sync with hextech, and let me know if that helps.
